abstract: It seems that Warren E. Buffett is not too happy about Posco’s potential bid for Daewoo Shipbuilding & Marine Engineering.
snippet: It seems that Warren E. Buffett is not too happy about Posco’s potential bid for Daewoo Shipbuilding & Marine Engineering.
lead_paragraph: It seems that Warren E. Buffett is not too happy about Posco‘s potential bid for Daewoo Shipbuilding & Marine Engineering.

headline.main: Buffett Said to Call for Study of Posco Bid
